trans-unit.source: Retrieves the classes from a window.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the classes from a window.

target.mrk: Retrieves the classes from a window.

trans-unit.source: The title/hWnd/class of the window to get the classes. See Title special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to get the classes.

target.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to get the classes.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The text of the window to get the classes. Default is an empty string. See Text special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The text of the window to get the classes.

target.mrk: The text of the window to get the classes.

trans-unit.source: a string containing the window classes read.

seg-source.mrk: a string containing the window classes read.

target.mrk: a string containing the window classes read.

trans-unit.source: "" and sets the @error flag to non-zero if the criteria does not match a window.

seg-source.mrk: "" and sets the @error flag to non-zero if the criteria does not match a window.

target.mrk: "" and sets the @error flag to non-zero if the criteria does not match a window.

trans-unit.source: Class names are linefeed (@LF) separated. WinGetClassList() works on both minimized and hidden windows. Up to 64KB of text can be retrieved.    If multiple windows match the criteria, the classes are read from the most recently active window.

seg-source.mrk: WinGetClassList() works on both minimized and hidden windows.
Up to 64KB of text can be retrieved.
If multiple windows match the criteria, the classes are read from the most recently active window.

target.mrk: WinGetClassList() works on both minimized and hidden windows.
Up to 64KB of text can be retrieved.
If multiple windows match the criteria, the classes are read from the most recently active window.

trans-unit.source: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

seg-source.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

target.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the classlist of the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve the classlist of the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

target.mrk: Retrieve the classlist of the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

trans-unit.source: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

target.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.
